Sleep

The Postmasters Boutique Hotel

Located above the ferry landing in the picturesque Rawene Village. Extensive decks look out over 3 sides of the Hokianga Harbour. Quirky ambience and warm hospitality. Breakfast menu and inhouse dining by arrangement. http://thepostmasterslodgings.co.nz

Grace Cottage

Grace cottage, 37 Manning street, Rawene. A romantic cottage situated on a quiet village street, overlooking the magnificent Hokianga Harbour, central to 'must do' subtropical Northland scenery and points of interest.
Fully equipped, self service, two bedrooms and en-suites of a very good standard.
Tariff: per day, NZD 200 for up to two couples. 2 days minimum.
NZD 950 for one week.
Not suitable for families.
Grace Cottage, ( Dorothy Foot ) Phone +64 9 405 7676

The Masonic Hotel

Rooms: Double and twin share. Shared facilties. Bookings: Call +64 9 405 7822
Facebook

Rawene Motorcamp

If you are looking for tranquility in a peaceful rural setting but close to the many unique features of New Zealand's Hokianga Harbour, then we are the place for you! Rawene Holiday Park is situated on a hilltop, sheltered by tranquil, native bush, offering our guests the opportunity to relax and enjoy fantastic views over the Hokianga Harbour and impressive sunsets.
Bookings: Call +64 9 405 7720
http://www.raweneholidaypark.co.nz/

Rāwene
